thread.title: Saundra

author: Saundra
title: Saundra
text:
We rented Nestled Inn for 3 nights. It was beautiful.
Check in was fast and easy. The cabin was just a 5 minutes away
There were 4 of us- 2 couples. The 2nd floor bedroom is open to the game room and sound does travel since the stairwell is open.
The beds were very comfortable. We loved that they gave us extra pillows, some soft and some firm. There is actually a full size hide-a-bed on the 2nd floor in addition to the king size bed.
The hot tub was perfect! It is under roof, too, so even in the rain it can be used.
We have rented other cabins in the area where they were very scant on trash bags, toilet paper, and paper towels. Not so with outrageous cabins. They supplied extra of all of these.
The only complaint we had was the kitchen was not as well supplied as it could have been. There were only 4 dinner plates, so we ran the dishwasher after each meal. There were only 3 wine glasses. We really needed a large skillet, but there were only 2 small ones.
We will rent from Outrageous Cabins the next time we are visiting the area!
